name: Faceless (itch) (KC.Aurigrids)
description:
Developers: KC.Aurigrids

- STORY -

The story begins after the demo plot ends. A girl wakes up and realizes she has lost her face, she hears the door open from behind, what awaits her?

- Feature -

✯ Original art.

✯ Ending: 3 Endings,  the ending is normal, good or bad, depending on the player's perception.

✯ Endings in Demo: 1 Normal Ending, 1 True Ending, and 1 Secret Scene.

✯ Playing time  official version: 3-4 hours

✯ Playing time demo: ~ 20 minutes

The official game version is still being completed, for now you can download and try demo version
